title: 89/505/EEC: Commission Decision of 18 July 1989 laying down the criteria governing entry in registers for hybrid breeding pigs
header:
23.8.1989 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 247/33
COMMISSION DECISION
of 18 July 1989
laying down the criteria governing entry in registers for hybrid breeding pigs
(89/505/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
To qualify for entry in the register hybrid breeding pigs must:
— be identified after birth according to the rules of that register,
— have parentage established in accordance with the rules of that register.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 July 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1)  OJ No L 382, 31. 12. 1988, p. 36.
